user.title: EON Energia
user.description:
Enter your EON Energia refresh token.

**How to obtain it:**
1. Log into https://myeon.eon-energia.com/
2. Open browser Developer Tools (F12)
3. Go to the Network tab
4. Refresh the page
5. Look for a request to `https://auth.eon-energia.com/oauth/token`
6. Click on it and check the Response tab
7. Find the response with `scope: openid profile email offline_access`
8. Copy the `refresh_token` value
